items.title: Filter logs by severity
items.content: Use {app="my-app", level="error"} in Loki to see application errors.

items.title: Monitor your memory in real-time
items.content: Use container_memory_usage_bytes in Mimir to create RAM usage alerts.

items.title: Find bottlenecks in APIs
items.content: In Tempo, filter by http.method="POST" and duration > 1s to find slowness.

items.title: Traces with specific status code
items.content: Use status_code="500" in Tempo to identify where errors are occurring.

items.title: Analyze log ingestion
items.content: Monitor the metric loki_distributor_bytes_received_total per tenant.

items.title: Use ready-to-go dashboards
items.content: In Grafana, import community dashboards to accelerate your setup.
